item.title: [EU/CA][Customer Panel][Order funnel][API][corporate websites] - TLSv1.0 and TLSv1.1 End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 15, 00:00 - 23:59 UTC

Feb 1, 01:39 UTC
Update - The scope has been broadened.
The components affected are now also in Canada.

Jan 30, 23:14 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/02/2023 00:00 UTC
End time : 15/02/2023 23:59 UTC
Service impact : Customers using outdated OS or browsers with only TLSv1.0 and TLSv1.1 capability will no longer be able to reach our commercial website and the customer panel.
Service improvement : On Wednesday February 15th 2023, OVHcloud will change the TLS configuration of its corporate websites endpoints and customer panel. This
change is performed to stick with industry security standards, we recommend that you upgrade your OS and browser to make sure you use at least TLSv1.2.
